WorkItem.Description: Similar to lighning and thunder capacitor, it looks like the pendulum needs specific handling to deal with it's special properties.  Right now it appears to be rated only on its haste rating but not on it's "harmful spells have a chance ..."
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Pendulum of Telluric Currents needs specific handling

Comments.Message: I'll add that right now.  If there are any other trinkets that need special handling that aren't listed, just update this issue with the names and I'll keep adding them.  Thanks.
Meteorite Whetstone is being rated high presumably due to the haste proc.  But since this can't proc from spells, it's mostly useless to a caster.
I'll look into that as well.
Not sure if you wanted it here or in another note but the glove enchant (produced by and for engineers): hyperspeed accelerators should likely be added for boomkin
I added the enchant as a flat haste rating.  Too bad it's not as potent as the spell power enchants for Moonkin.

One last thing: Meteorite Whetstone isn't being modeled as a proc-type trinket right now.  Whoever added the parsing for that trinket made it a flat 111 haste rating, which is why it's showing up as a good trinket in the Moonkin model.  If it were changed to be a specially handled proc, it would be filtered out of the caster models.
